name: Сollision Hero
description:
The typical hero travels to typical locations, killing typical enemies with typical weapons. Kawaii ? Sure, UwU.

Take a part in the most ordinary adventure. Become the most ordinary hero:

  • Discover the Most Common Levels
  • Overcome the Most Common Obstacles
  • Use the most common store to buy the most common equipment



Fight against the most common monsters :

  • Goblins
  • Skeletons
  • Slugs
  • Boxes (really?)
